question: {name} has a {product} stand at the {location}. He sells three kinds of {product}s: {item1}, {item2} and {item3}. He usually sells {item1} for {cur}{p1} per {unit}, {item2} for {cur}{p2} per {unit} and {item3} for {cur}{p3} per {unit}. {name} has no change today, so he has decided to round all his prices to the nearest dollar. If {name} sells {n1} {unit}s of {item1}, {n2} {unit}s of {item2} and {n3} {unit}s of {item3}, how much will he make?
